sqlMap.select: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), t.入场时间, 20) AS startTime, '' AS endTime, t.卡片号码 AS cardNo, t.车牌号码 AS carNo FROM MYCARCOMERECORD t WHERE t.入场时间 > dateadd(mi, -3, getdate())
SELECT '' AS startTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), t.出场时间, 20) AS endTime, t.卡片号码 AS cardNo, t.车牌号码 AS carNo FROM MYCARGOOUTRECORD t WHERE t.出场时间 > dateadd(mi, -3, getdate())
